title: Wear Alert for Tasker
summary: Send alerts to your Android Wear watch using Tasker!
developerAddress:
The internet
AFK: Calle Timoteo Padros 14, 28200 El Escorial, Madrid, Spain
description: This Tasker plugin allows you to send custom alerts to your watch, for instance a Toast, a Fullscreen alert or a notification.
descriptionHTML: This Tasker plugin allows you to send custom alerts to your watch, for instance a Toast, a Fullscreen alert or a notification.
comments: Crashes on toasts Need fix ASAP
